ygData.subject: Re: Mana for Songs?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I went onto the test server this morning, and none of the songs in the three main bard guilds required mana, though all had Mana cost: 0 listed on them
ygData.messageBody:
Brian Dickens wrote:

> From: Brian Dickens <briandickens@...>
>
> Was this change even implemented on the test server yet? If so, does
> anyone play on the test server? I am curious to find out what songs
> they would make require mana.



I went onto the test server this morning, and none of the songs in the three
main bard guilds required mana, though all had "Mana cost: 0" listed on them
(can't remember if that was there before or not).

I didn't not have a chance to check Highpass or Erudin.

Any information on this somwhat alarming development is appreciated :)

Jyzan
